SELECT LPAD(o.od_no, 5,0)||'-'||LPAD(d.od_detailno, 6, 0) as "no" , o.od_no , d.od_detailno , o.od_dt , c.cli_name , o.od_chg , p.pd_name , d.qt , d.due_dt , d.send_od_st FROM od o JOIN od_detail d ON o.od_no = d.od_no JOIN cli c ON c.cli_cd = o.cli_cd JOIN pd p ON p.pd_cd = d.pd_cd WHERE d.send_od_st = 1
ORDER BY o.od_no ASC, d.od_detailno DESC

SELECT LPAD(o.od_no, 5,0)||'-'||LPAD(d.od_detailno, 6, 0) as "no" , o.od_dt , c.cli_name , o.od_chg , p.pd_name , d.qt , d.due_dt , d.send_od_st , FIND_CODE_NAME ('od_st', d.send_od_st) AS send_st_name FROM od o JOIN od_detail d ON o.od_no = d.od_no JOIN cli c ON c.cli_cd = o.cli_cd JOIN pd p ON p.pd_cd = d.pd_cd WHERE d.send_od_st = 2 OR d.send_od_st = 3
ORDER BY o.od_no ASC, d.od_detailno DESC
